==Description==

Strip close comment and close php tags from [[File Header | file headers]] used by WP (See [http://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/8497 Ticket #8497]). It is used by <tt>[[Function_Reference/get_file_description | get_file_description()]]</tt>.
